Mark, to be believed in, to be practiſed, for Moſes and the Prophets they was in the light, & they ſpake forth the Scriptures from the light, and they ſpake them forth to be fulfilled; and what they wrote they wrote to be fulfilled, and Chriſt Jeſus the light came to fulfil what was wrote of him, and they ſaw; Moſes and the Prophets ſaw what muſt come to fulfil their words; Chriſt Jeſus which did come to fulfil their words, and the Jews that were out of the light, ſaw not Chriſt when he was come to fulfil Moſes and the Prophets words, the Jews profeſſed, and the Apoſtles who witneſſed Chriſt, and the Diſciples, who was come to fulfil what was written of him; they ſhewed to the Jews, Phariſees, and to the great wiſe Profeſſors, great knowing men who profeſſed Moſes and the Prophets that a Meſ ia •
was to come, they being out of the light, they ſhewed unto them that Jeſus was the Chriſt out of M • ſ • s and the Prophets, which they profeſſed but did not believe in the light; ſo they ſhewed the fulfilling of the Prophets, and the fulfilling of Moſes words and preached to them him that was come, which did fulfil them, which they that did believe in the light come to ſee the ſecond Prieſt-hood, who turned were from the firſt Prieſt-hood, Temple, Synagogue, Prieſt-hood that took Tiths. But them that did not believe in the light, ſtumbled at the Apoſtles words, and ſtumbled at the light, which doth enlighten every one that cometh into the world; theſe Builders rejected the • orner-ſtone, and counted themſelves unworthy of e • ernal life, and though they profeſſed Moſes and the Prophets words, but believed not in the light, as all our Profeſſors and Prieſts of the world in our dayes, which believeth not in
the light that lighteth every man that cometh into the world, judging themſelves unworthy of eternal life, yet profeſſing Moſes, Chriſt, and the Apoſtles words; but ſeeth not the fulfilling of Moſes and the Prophets, nor Chriſts words and Apoſtles words, ſuch as be out of the light, that believes not in it, theſe are now haling out of the Synagogue, priſoning, and beating, and perſecuting that believe not in the light, that enlighteneth every man that cometh into the world, as the Jews did out of their Temple, which priſoned and perſecuted as thoſe do, and haled before Magiſtrates, which fulfil choiſe words, they that did ſo believed not in the light, but were out of the light, and ſo they know not the Son nor the Father: take notice of this, all prieſts and people, who are haling now out of the Synagogues, who are the generation that are fulfilling Chriſts words, that the righteous blood may come upon you all. But the Lamb hath gotten the victory, and the Saints ſings over you all, them that be out of the light be out of truth, which anſwers light and truth in every man, which is the condemnation of all that are out of the light, and hate it, and this is the word of the Lord God to you, and all that ſees the light ſees their ſalvation, they that believe in the light and in that do dwell which condemn all the world, and none cometh to everlaſting life, but who cometh to the light, which doth enlighten every man that cometh into the world, who is the life and as every man cometh to the light which he is enlightened withal, he cometh to the life of man, and he cometh to the way to the Father, which no man cometh to the way to the Father, but who cometh to the light, which enlighteneth him and every one that cometh into the world, by which light all things were made, and none cometh to truth but who cometh to the light, which doth enlighten every one that cometh
into the world, him by whom the world was made, glorified with the Father before the world began, and no man cometh to the glorious Goſpel, which is the Image of God, but who cometh to the light which enlighteneth every man that cometh into the world and no man receiveth the power to become the Sons of God, but who receiveth the light which cometh from Chriſt, which is the power of God, who doth enlighten every one that cometh into the world, him by whom it was made, nor no man cometh to the truth in the inward parts, but ſuch as cometh to the light, which doth enlighten every one that cometh into the world, him by whom it was made, who doth enligh • en every man that cometh into the world; who is the truth in the inward parts, there is it to be heard, found, ſeen, and received, with that is Chriſt the miſtery the light ſeen, with the light which comes from him, which is the truth in the inward parts; with this is the Kingdom of God ſeen, which hath no end, and here is the light of the Goſpel known, which is the Image of God, with this is the God of this World ſeen with the light which comes from him, which was glorified with the Father before the world began. Take notice of this all ye children of light, and all they that do withſtand the light, which doth enlighten every man that cometh into the world, him by whom it was made, glorified with the Father before the world began, they do withſtand the way; for every one coming into the world, having a light that comes from the way, lets him ſee the way, and a light from the life lets him ſee the life, and a light from the truth lets him ſee the truth, and a light from the word lets him ſee the words, and lets him ſee the word that was in the beginning before the world was: this light from the way to the Father, with which they know the
way to the Father into the Kingdom of God, where there is no ſhadow, a light from him which was glorified with the Father before the World began, which light ſhining in the heart, gives them the light of the glory of God in the face of Jeſus Chriſt, and this is the treaſure in earthen veſſels; now every man having a light from the truth which is the Chriſt, which is the way to the Father the God of all truth, here you need not go forth to ask where you ſhall find truth, for it is in your inward parts, and as that teacheth you, and you abide in it, you continue in the Son, and in the Father, from whence it comes, and every man having a light from Chriſt, who is the light, with which light hee will ſee him that comes from him, which light leads to him that he may believe in him, he ſhall not come into condemnation; he need not to ſay, lo here is Chriſt, lo there's Chriſt, he that believeth in the light that enlighteneth every man that cometh into the world: now every man believing in the light, which enlighteneth every man that cometh into the world, with which they be lighted withal, here's the true belief, then they believe in Chriſt, who is the light. Mark, in him, for the Phariſees believed, had the letter, who did not believe in the light, ſo was blind; ſo are all now who do not believe in the light, which lighteth every man that cometh into the world, therefore they that do not believe in the light, which doth enlighten every man that cometh into the World, that they might believe through him: But talkes of a belief, becauſe the Scriptures declares, and believes not in the light, they believe not in the truth, the devils, which be out of the light, which is the truth, can talk of the Scriptures as well as all the World, which is out of the light, out of truth, which doth enlighten every man that cometh into the world,
that all men through him might believe, they that withſtand the light that enlighteneth every man that cometh into the world withſtands the way, and they that ſtumble at it, ſtumble at the way, and they that ſtumble at the light that lighteth every man that cometh into the world, they ſtumble at truth, and they know not Chriſt, which doth enlighten every man that cometh into the world; and Prieſt and people knows not John the meſſenger of Chriſt, ſent from God to bear witneſs to this true light, that doth enlighten every man that cometh into the world, who ſuffered death by the powers of the earth for bearing his righteous teſtimony againſt the unrighteous, and the powers of the earth, and the great Rabbies ſtandeth againſt them now, and doth caſt them into priſon, that are the witneſſes of this light, this true light, that doth enlighten every one that cometh into the world, that all men through him might believe, who is the Son of God, and againſt this light which doth enlighten every man that cometh into the world, the powers of the earth, and the rulers of the earth, and the chief Prieſts gathered Councels together againſt, who lighted every man that cometh into the world, him by whom it was made, and ſo all they that are ſtumbling at the light, which doth enlighten every man that cometh into the world, which is the Covenant of God, the Covenant of light, they are ſtumbling at the Covenant, and all them; And thoſe that keep people from the light, that doth enlighten every man that cometh into the world, keep people from the Covenant of God, the Covenant of light, the Covenant of life, the Covenant of peace; and to you this is the word of the Lord God, and every man coming into the
world, being enlightened with the Covenant of light, he loving the light, and receiving the light, he receives the Covenant; but hating the light he goes into the evil deeds, and this is the light doth make them manifeſt, and this his condemnation that hates it▪ the light and not believing in it, and this the lig ••
〈◊〉 torments the evil doer, and reprooves him and m •• e • manifeſt his wayes and deeds, and this is the light that makes manifeſt him that abode not in truth, that ſpeaks a lie, that's from the truth, from the light, with the light condemned, which anſwers the light in every mans conſcience; ſo this is the word of the Lord God.
